Notice requirement: Employer must disclose the terms of the non-compete in writing before acceptance of employment offer
Exceptions: n/a

laws.full_text:
e threshold: Employee must earn more than $123,394.17 annually
Notice requirement: Employer must disclose the terms of the non-compete in writing before acceptance of employment offer
Exceptions: n/a
Wisconsin

Reasonableness requirement: Must be reasonable in duration, geographic scope, and activities prohibited
Specific duration limit: n/a
Wage threshold: n/a
Notice requirement: n/a
Exceptions: n/a
West
laws.suggestion: Modify the non-compete clause to include the required notice and reasonableness language: "Please note that this non-compete agreement is subject to Wisconsin law and must be reasonable in duration, geographic scope, and activity, and you must earn more than $123,394.17 annually for this clause to be applicable; by signing below, you acknowledge receipt of the terms of this non-compete agreement prior to accepting this employment offer.

laws.suggestion: Remove salary history questions. Replace with: 'Please provide your salary expectations for this role, as Wisconsin law prohibits inquiries into prior salary history.
